What fast fashion and high-end brands categorize as XS

to XL in hip sizes

Each brand’s range of hip sizes in inches from extra small (XS) to

extra large (XL).

American Eagle had the

smallest small (S) hip size

starting at 32 inches.

Brand AMO had the largest

small (S) hip size at 37 inches.

50

40

45

35

Hip size in inches

Source: Web scrapping by Ananya C.

CleanPNG and pnegg provided the logos.
